name: Power Cores
description:
Imagine you are a robot on the edge of its existence. Your task is to survive as long as you can, collecting power cores from hostile machines. And it's not easy, when every shot and every second depletes your power level.

Move with WSAD. Shoot with mouse.

I recommend playing Windows standalone version (WebGL build have some sound issues).

Sound effects generated with http://www.bfxr.net/

Music by Trevor Lentz (https://opengameart.org/users/trevor-lentz)

Game made for Ludum Dare 39 in Unity3D.
